oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /etc/crontab文件的用户所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: /etc/crontab文件使用cron来控制自身工作。本条目中命令在此处确保文件的用户所有者是root。

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断： # stat -L -c "%u" /etc/crontab 0
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chown root /etc/crontab
rationale:/etc/crontab文件包含那些由cron运行的系统作业信息。写访问这些文件可以提供未经授权的用户提升其特权的能力，读访问这些文件可以提供用户查看系统运行作业的能力，并提供他们一种方式获取非法特权访问。

remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chown :root /etc/crontab
rationale:/etc/crontab文件包含那些由cron运行的系统作业信息。写访问这些文件可以提供未经授权的用户提升其特权的能力，读访问这些文件可以提供用户查看系统运行作业的能力，并提供他们一种方式获取非法特权访问。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /etc/cron.hourly文件的用户组所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 该目录包含了需要每小时都运行的系统调度作业，目录中的文件不能被crontab命令操纵，但系统管理员可以使用文本编辑器编辑它。下面的命令限制读取、写入和搜索的访问用户组为root。

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断： # stat -L -c "%g" /etc/cron.hourly 0
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chown :root /etc/cron.hourly
rationale:授予非特权用户对该目录的写访问权限可能会提供给他们未经授权获得提升权限的手段。授予该目录的读取权限可以给非特权用户观察如何提升权限或规避审计控制的机会。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Password hashing algorithm
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Limit su Access to the wheel group
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The wheel group should exist

oval-def:criterion.comment: Tests the value of the <:begin:>auth[\s]+required[\s]+pam_wheel.so[\s]+use_uid<:end:> setting in the /etc/pam.d/su file

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Ensure that No Dangerous Directories Exist in Root's Path
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The PATH variable should be set correctly for user root

oval-def:criteria.comment: PATH starts with ':' or '.', path contains '::' or ':.:' or path ends with ':' or '.'

oval-def:criterion.comment: PATH starts with ':' or '.', path contains '::' or ':.:' or path ends with ':' or '.'

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Ensure that User Home Directories are not Group-Writable or World-Readable
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: File permissions should be set correctly for the home directories for all user accounts.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Remove Legacy + Entries from Password Files
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: NIS file inclusions should be set appropriately in the /etc/group file

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Remove Legacy + Entries from Password Files
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: NIS file inclusions should be set appropriately in the /etc/passwd file

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Remove Legacy + Entries from Password Files
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: NIS file inclusions should be set appropriately in the /etc/shadow file

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Verify that No Accounts Have Empty Password Fields
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Login access to accounts without passwords should be disabled

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置GNOME警告标识
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: GNOME显示管理器用于登陆会话管理，GDM手册中包含更多信息。针对它的加固操作可以作为GDM用户登录前的警告信息。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： gconftool-2 -get /apps/gdm/simple-greeter/banner_message_text

remediation:运行以下命令更正： # /bin/su -s /bin/sh gdm # gconftool-2 -direct -config-source=xml:readwrite:$HOME/.gconf -type bool -set /apps/gdm/simple-greeter/banner_message_enable true # gconftool-2 -direct -config-source=xml:readwrite:$HOME/.gconf -t string -s /apps/gdm/simple-greeter/banner_message_text "Your-Login-Banner" 需要重启gdm以使设置生效。
rationale:警告信息告知试图登录的用户系统相关的法律信息，包括所有者的组织名称、实行的监控政策等。可以咨询本地法律顾问选择合适的措辞。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置标准登录服务的警告标识
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: /etc/issue文件中内容将位于系统控制台和串行设备登陆提示符之前显示。/etc/motd文件在成功所有成功登陆后显示，由于用户已经成功登陆作用略小。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令验证文件是否存在和权限是否正确： # /bin/ls -l /etc/motd -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 2055 Jan 30 16:30 /etc/motd # ls /etc/issue -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 2055 Jan 30 16:30 /etc/issue # ls /etc/issue.net -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 2055 Jan 30 16:30 /etc/issue.net 通过cat命令查看以上三个文件的内容以确保警告标识正确。

remediation:运行以下命令更正： # touch /etc/motd # echo "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported." > /etc/issue # echo "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported." > /etc/issue.net # chown root:root /etc/motd # chmod 644 /etc/motd # chown root:root /etc/issue # chmod 644 /etc/issue # chown root:root /etc/issue.net # chmod 644 /etc/issue.net
rationale:警告信息告知试图登录的用户系统相关的法律信息，包括所有者的组织名称、实行的监控政策等。可以咨询本地法律顾问选择合适的措辞。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Block Shell and Login Access for Non-Root System Accounts
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Login access to non-root system accounts should be disabled

oval-def:criterion.comment: check /etc/passwd for /sbin/nologin on non root system accounts

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Limit password reuse
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The passwords to remember should be set correctly.

oval-def:criterion.comment: remember parameter is set to 0 (note this is negated)
check the /etc/pam.d/common-password password module has a remember option set appropriately

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 密码复杂度要求
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: pam_cracklib模块可以检查密码强度。本检查项涉及密码的长度、组成等等，以下是的pam_cracklib.so选项定义： dcredit=-1 - 至少包含1个数字 ucredit=-1 - 至少包含1个大写字母 ocredit=-1 - 至少包含1个特殊字符 lcredit=-1 - 至少包含1个小些字符 以上设置只代表常见设置，用户可以按需调整策略。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查pam_cracklib.so文件是否包含如下选项： # grep pam_cracklib.so /etc/pam.d/system-auth password required pam_cracklib.so try_first_pass *** dcredit=-1 ucredit=-1 ocredit=-1 lcredit=-1 ***
remediation:设置/etc/pam.d/system-auth文件pam_cracklib.so参数如下： password required pam_cracklib.so try_first_pass *** dcredit=-1 ucredit=-1 ocredit=-1 lcredit=-1 ***
rationale:强壮的密码可以保护系统免受暴力方法攻击。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 使审计配置不可改变
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 设置系统审计以便审核规则不能通过auditctl修改。设置标志"-e 2"强制审核为不可变模式。审核变化只能在系统重启后进行。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断审核行为是否不可修改: # grep "^-e 2" /etc/audit/audit.rules -e 2
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件最后一行： -e 2
rationale:在不可修改模式下，未经授权的用户不能对审计系统进行短暂修改以掩盖潜在的恶意行为。系统重启行为很容易被注意到并提醒管理员未经授权的审核更改。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集使用特权命令
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 监控特权程序以确定是否有非特权用户运行这些命令。

notes.note: audit:确保每个setuid/setgid程序的审计部分都在伴有上述属性的审核文件中出现。
remediation:为了修复这个问题，系统管理员必须执行一个find命令找到所有特权程序，然后为它们添加一个审计文本。
rationale:非特权用户执行特权命令可能指示有人试图非法访问系统。

oval-def:criterion.comment: /etc/audit/audit.rules contains -a always,exit -F path=/bin/ping -F perm=x -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k privileged

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集失败的未授权文件权访问请求
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 监控失败的文件访问尝试。下列变量与控制创建、打开、截断等文件操作的系统调用相关。一条审核日志将仅用于记录非特权用户、非守护进程事件以及系统调用返回EACCES或EPERM 。所有的审核记录将被"access"标识所标记。

notes.note: audit:对于64位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep access /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access 对于32位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep access /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access

remediation:对于64位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd 对于32位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd
rationale:打开、创建和截断文件的失败企图可能显示个人或进程试图获得未经授权的系统访问。

oval-def:criteria.comment: check for 32-bit rules

oval-def:criterion.comment: check that 32-bit arch is irrelevant for this architecture
/etc/audit/audit.rules contains -a always,exit -F arch=ARCH -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access
/etc/audit/audit.rules contains -a always,exit -F arch=ARCH -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access

oval-def:criteria.comment: check for 64-bit rules

oval-def:criterion.comment: check that 64-bit arch is irrelevant for this architecture
/etc/audit/audit.rules contains -a always,exit -F arch=ARCH -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EACCES -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access
/etc/audit/audit.rules contains -a always,exit -F arch=ARCH -S creat -S open -S openat -S truncate -S ftruncate -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集会话初始化信息
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 监视会话初始化事件。本检查项中的参数追踪与会话事件相关的文件变化。文件/var/run/utmp追踪所有当前登录的用户。文件/var/log/wtmp文件追踪登录，注销，关机和重启等事件。所有审核记录都将被“session”标识所标记。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断会话发起信息的收集情况： # grep session /etc/audit/audit.rules -w /var/run/utmp -p wa -k session -w /var/log/wtmp -p wa -k session -w /var/log/btmp -p wa -k session
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -w /var/run/utmp -p wa -k session -w /var/log/wtmp -p wa -k session -w /var/log/btmp -p wa -k session 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd
rationale:监视这些文件的变化可以提醒系统管理员在异常时间发生的登录，这可能表明存在入侵活动。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集登录和注销事件
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 监测登录和注销事件，以下参数记录登录/注销相关的文件变化。/var/log/faillog文件记录登录失败事件，/var/log/lastlog文件保有用户最后一次成功登录事件，/var/log/btmp文件追踪不断失败的登录企图并可以通过键入/usr/bin/last -f /var/log/btmp命令读取。所有的审核记录将会被"logins"标识所有标记。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断事件是否被记录： # grep logins /etc/audit/audit.rules -w /var/log/faillog -p wa -k logins -w /var/log/lastlog -p wa -k logins -w /var/log/tallylog -p wa -k logins
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -w /var/log/faillog -p wa -k logins -w /var/log/lastlog -p wa -k logins -w /var/log/tallylog -p wa -k logins 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd
rationale:监控登录/注销事件可以给系统管理员提供暴力破解的相关信息。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启动auditd服务
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: 打开auditd守护进程来记录系统事件。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查auditd是否开启： # chkconfig --list auditd auditd: 0: off 1: off 2: on 3: on 4: on 5: on 6: off
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chkconfig auditd on
rationale:捕获系统事件可以为系统管理员提供信息判断是否有未授权访问在他们的系统中发生。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启动rsyslog服务
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: chkconfig命令可以用来确保syslog服务被关闭，rsyslog服务被打开。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # chkconfig --list syslog syslog 0:off 1:off 2:off 3:off 4:off 5:off 6:off # chkconfig --list rsyslog rsyslog 0:off 1:off 2:on 3:on 4:on 5:on 6:off
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chkconfig syslog off # chkconfig rsyslog on
rationale:确保syslog服务被关闭是很重要的，以便其不会对rsyslog服务造成干扰。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 移除NIS
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: NIS是一个客户端/服务器目录服务协议，用于分发系统配置文件。NIS服务是一系列配置文件分发程序的集合。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # rpm -q ypserv package ypserv is not installed
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # yum erase ypserv
rationale:如果不需要NIS服务，建议将守护程序从系统中删除。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用NIS服务
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: NIS是一个客户端/服务器目录服务协议，用于分发系统配置文件。NIS服务是一系列配置文件分发程序的集合。

notes.note: audit:确NIS保服务器未启用： # chkconfig --list ypserv ypserv 0:off 1:off 2:off 3:off 4:off 5:off 6:off
remediation:禁用NIS服务器: # chkconfig ypserv off
rationale:NIS服务易受DOS攻击和缓冲区溢出攻击，本质上是不安全的，在查询NIS映射方面身份验证较差。 NIS大体上已被LDAP等协议所取代，因此建议禁用该服务。

oval-def:criteria.comment: ypserv is not installed or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /tmp目录分区设置noexec选项
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: noexec挂载选项指文件系统不能包含可执行二进制程序文件。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查系统配置： # grep /tmp /etc/fstab | grep noexec # mount | grep /tmp | grep noexec 如果任一命令没有输出则系统没有按要求配置。
remediation:编辑/etc/fstab文件并增加noexec选项到挂载选项。
rationale:由于/tmp分区只打算做临时文件存储，设置该选项确保用户不会在该目录启动二进制程序。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /tmp目录分区设置nosuid选项
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: nosuid挂载选项指文件系统不能包含setuid文件。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查系统配置： # grep /tmp /etc/fstab | grep nosuid # mount | grep /tmp | grep nosuid 如果任一命令没有输出则系统没有按要求配置。
remediation:编辑/etc/fstab文件并增加nosuid选项到挂载选项。
rationale:由于/tmp分区只打算做临时文件存储，设置该选项确保用户不会在该目录创建setuid文件。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /tmp目录分区设置为nodev选项
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: nodev挂载选项指文件系统不能包含特殊设备。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查系统配置： # grep /tmp /etc/fstab | grep nodev # mount | grep /tmp | grep nodev 如果任一命令没有输出则系统没有按要求配置。
remediation:编辑/etc/fstab文件并增加nodev选项到挂载选项。
rationale:由于/tmp文件系统并不打算支持设备，设置这个选项确保用户不能试图在该目录创建块或字符特殊设备。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Maximum Number of Concurrent Login Sessions Per User
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The maximum number of concurrent login sessions per user should meet minimum requirements.

oval-def:criteria.comment: the value maxlogins should be set appropriately in /etc/security/limits.conf

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 审核先于auditd启动的进程
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Look for argument audit=1 in the kernel line in /boot/grub/menu.lst .

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断/etc/grub.conf文件是否配置正确： # grep "kernel" /etc/grub.conf 确保每个以kernel开始的行都设置了audit=1参数。
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # ed /etc/grub.conf << END g/audit=1/s///g g/kernel/s/$/ audit=1/ w q END
rationale:先于auditd启动的进程也需捕获审计事件，从而让潜在的恶意活动不被忽视。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /var目录需要单独创建分区
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Ensuring that /var is mounted on its own partition enables the setting of more restrictive mount options, which is used as temporary storage by many program, particularly system services such as daemons. It is not uncommon for the /var directory to contain world-writable directories, installed by other software packages.

notes.note: audit:验证/etc/fstab文件中是否存在/var分区: #grep /var /etc/fstab <volume> /var ext3 <options>
remediation:对于全新安装的操作系统，勾选“查看和修改分区”并为/var创建一个单独分区。 对于已安装的操作系统，使用LVM（逻辑卷管理器）来创建分区。
rationale:/var目录存在通用可写特性，如果不绑定到独立分区会存在资源耗尽风险。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集自主访问控制权限修改事件
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

notes.note: audit:对于64位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep perm_mod /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S chmod -S fchmod -S fchmodat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chmod -S fchmod -S fchmodat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S chown -S fchown -S fchownat -S lchown -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chown -S fchown -S fchownat -S lchown -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S setxattr -S lsetxattr -S fsetxattr -S removexattr -S lremovexattr -S fremovexattr -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S setxattr -S lsetxattr -S fsetxattr -S removexattr -S lremovexattr -S fremovexattr -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod 对于32位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep perm_mod /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chmod -S fchmod -S fchmodat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chown -S fchown -S fchownat -S lchown -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S setxattr -S lsetxattr -S fsetxattr -S removexattr -S lremovexattr -S fremovexattr -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod

remediation:对于64位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S chmod -S fchmod -S fchmodat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chmod -S fchmod -S fchmodat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S chown -S fchown -S fchownat -S lchown -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chown -S fchown -S fchownat -S lchown -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S setxattr -S lsetxattr -S fsetxattr -S removexattr -S lremovexattr -S fremovexattr -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S setxattr -S lsetxattr -S fsetxattr -S removexattr -S lremovexattr -S fremovexattr -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd 对于32位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chmod -S fchmod -S fchmodat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S chown -S fchown -S fchownat -S lchown -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S setxattr -S lsetxattr -S fsetxattr -S removexattr -S lremovexattr -S fremovexattr -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k perm_mod 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd
rationale:监测文件属性的变化可以提醒系统管理员可能的入侵活动或政策违反情况。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Service sshd Disabled
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The sshd service should be disabled if possible.

service sshd is not configured to start

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SSH2协议
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The OpenSSH daemon should be running protocol 2.

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断SSH设置： # grep "^Protocol" /etc/ssh/sshd_config Protocol 2
remediation:编辑/etc/ssh/sshd_config文件，设置参数如下： Protocol 2
rationale:SSH v1的安全隐患并不影响SSH v2。

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

notes.note: audit:确保RSH服务器未启用： # chkconfig --list rsh rsh: off
rationale:这个传统服务包含许多安全漏洞，并已被更安全的SSH软件所替换。

oval-def:criteria.comment: package rsh-server removed or service rsh is not configured to start

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Find Unauthorized World-Writable Files
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The world-write permission should be disabled for all files.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用IP转发
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.ip_forward" should be set to "0".

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断net.ipv4.ip_forward在系统上是否启用。 # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.ip_forward net.ipv4.ip_forward = 0
remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf中的参数net.ipv4.ip_forward为0： net.ipv4.ip_forward=0 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:该net.ipv4.ip_forward设置标志用于告诉服务器是否可以转发数据包与否。如果服务器不被用作路由器，将该标志设置为0。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.ip_forward set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable rds Kernel Module
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel module rds should be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启用ExecShield
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "kernel.exec-shield" should be set to "1".

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令来判断ExecShield是否已启用： # sysctl kernel.exec-shield kernel.exec-shield = 1
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/sysctl.conf文件： kernel.exec-shield = 1
rationale:开启可以防范缓冲区溢出攻击并增强系统安全的所有特性。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.exec-shield set to 1

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Change the default policy to DROP (from ACCEPT) for the INPUT built-in chain
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Change the default policy to DROP (from ACCEPT) for the INPUT built-in chain.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集成功挂载文件系统信息
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Audit rules that detect the mounting of filesystems should be enabled.

notes.note: audit:对于64位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep mounts /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S mount -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k mounts -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S mount -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k mounts -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access 对于32位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep mounts /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S mount -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k mounts

remediation:对于64位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S mount -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k mounts -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S mount -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k mounts -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd 对于32位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S mount -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k mounts -F exit=-EPERM -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k access 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd
rationale:通常情况下非特权用户不会挂载文件系统到操作系统中。虽然追踪挂载命令可以给系统管理员外部媒体被挂载的证据，但它并不能表明数据已被导出。如果想判断数据是否外泄，管理员必须记录成功的创建、打开、截断等请求外部文件系统写权限的系统调用。这将指出一个明确的写操作。追踪写系统调用并不推荐，因为它将会迅速填满审核日志。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启用忽略广播请求
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts" should be set to "1".

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断该数据包是否被忽略： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts = 1

remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf中参数net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts为1： net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts=1 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts=1 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:接收以本地网络作为广播或多播地址的ICMP echo和时间戳请求可以用来欺骗主机展开Smurf攻击。Smurf攻击依靠攻击者使用伪造的源地址发送大量的ICMP广播报文。所有主机收到这个消息并回应echo应答消息到伪造地址（可能无法路由）。如果大量主机对报文作出响应，网络上的通信量可以显著叠加。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts set to 1

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package sendmail should be removed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 记录修改用户/组信息的事件
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Audit rules should detect modification to system files that hold information about users and groups.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断修改用户/组信息的事件是否被记录： # grep identity /etc/audit/audit.rules -w /etc/group -p wa -k identity -w /etc/passwd -p wa -k identity -w /etc/gshadow -p wa -k identity -w /etc/shadow -p wa -k identity -w /etc/security/opasswd -p wa -k identity

remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -w /etc/group -p wa -k identity -w /etc/passwd -p wa -k identity -w /etc/gshadow -p wa -k identity -w /etc/shadow -p wa -k identity -w /etc/security/opasswd -p wa -k identity 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -P 1-HUP auditd
rationale:这些文件发生意想不到的变化可能是系统已遭到破坏的一个迹象，未经授权的用户正试图隐藏自己的活动或破坏其他帐户。

both ...

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: group文件的用户组所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/group file should be owned by the appropriate group.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/group文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/group -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 762 Sep 23 002 /etc/group
remediation:如果/etc/group文件的用户组所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/group
rationale:group文件需要防止非特权用户进行未经授权的更改。但这些信息应该是可读的，因为很多非特权程序需要使用这些信息。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 记录修改系统网络环境的事件
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The network environment should not be modified by anything other than administrator action. Any change to network parameters should be audited.

notes.note:
audit:在64位系统中，通过运行以下命令来并确保输出如下所示，判断是否该修改系统的环境的事件被记录下来： # grep system-locale /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S sethostname -S setdomainname -k system-locale -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S sethostname -S setdomainname -k system-locale -w /etc/issue -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/issue.net -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/hosts -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/sysconfig/network -p wa -k system-locale
对于32位系统，通过运行以下命令来并确保输出如下所示，判断是否该修改系统的环境的事件被记录下来： # g

remediation:对于64位系统，添加以下行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S sethostname -S setdomainname -k system-locale -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S sethostname -S setdomainname -k system-locale -w /etc/issue -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/issue.net -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/hosts -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/sysconfig/network -p wa -k system-locale 执行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -P 1-HUP auditd
For 32 bit systems, add the following lines to the /etc/audit/audit.rules file. -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S sethostname -S setdomainname -k system-locale -w /etc/issue -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/issue.net -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/hosts -p wa -k system-locale -w /etc/sysconfig/network -p wa -k system-locale 执行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -P 1-HUP auditd

rationale:监视sethostname和setdomainname会发现主机名称和系统域名可能未经授权的更改。这些名字的变化可能会破坏基于这些名称设置的安全参数。监测/etc/hosts文件变化可以指示未经授权的入侵者试图改变主机与IP的对应关心并诱使用户和进程连接意料之外的主机。监视/etc/issue和/etc/issue.net同样重要，因为入侵者可以把虚假信息放入这些文件，诱骗用户提供其它信息给入侵者。监测的/etc/sysconfig/network也很重要，因为它可以显示是否网络接口或脚本被修改，导致机器变得不可用或受到损害。所有审核记录将被标识符“system-locale”所标记。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用telnet-server服务
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Disable telnet Service

notes.note: audit:确保telnet服务器没有启用: # chkconfig --list telnet telnet: off
remediation:禁用telnet服务器: # chkconfig telnet off
rationale:Telnet协议是未加密不安全。使用未加密的传输介质可能允许有访问权限的用户嗅探网络流量并窃取认证凭据。 SSH软件包通过加密会话提供更强的安全性，已包含在大多数的Linux发行版中。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用安全ICMP重定向接收
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects" should be set to "0".

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令来验证ICMP重定向报文是否会从已知网关拒绝： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects = 0 # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.default.secure_redirects net.ipv4.conf.default.secure_redirects = 0

remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf文件中参数net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects和net.ipv4.conf.default.secure_redirects为0: net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects=0 net.ipv4.conf.default.secure_redirects=0 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.secure_redirects=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:即使网关是已知的，仍然有可能受到攻击。设置net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects 为0可以保护系统不受可能遭到攻击的已知网关的路由更新。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.secure_redirects set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fchmod
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /var/log目录需要单独创建分区
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: System logs are stored in the /var/log directory. Ensure that it has its own partition or logical volume.

notes.note: audit:验证/etc/fstab文件中是否存在/var/log分区: #grep /var/log /etc/fstab <volume> /var/log ext3 <options>
remediation:对于全新安装的操作系统，勾选“查看和修改分区”并为/var/log创建一个单独分区。 对于已安装的操作系统，使用LVM（逻辑卷管理器）来创建分区。
rationale:日志文件可以增长得非常大从而导致资源耗尽风险。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /etc/grub.conf文件的访问权限需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: File permissions for /boot/grub/grub.conf should be set to 0600.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令来验证/etc/grub.conf的权限设置： # stat -L -c "%a" /etc/grub.conf | egrep ".00" 如果以上命令没有任何输出则系统没有按推荐方式配置。
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chown root:root /etc/grub.conf
rationale:设置只有root才具有读写权限可以放着非root用户看到启动参数并修改。非root用户看到启动参数，可能会辨别出系统启动时的弱点，并尝试破坏它。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Restrict Serial Port Root Logins
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Preventing direct root login to serial port interfaces helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Password difok Requirements
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The password difok should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置密码更改的最小天数
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The minimum password age policy should be set appropriately.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # grep PASS_MIN_DAYS /etc/login.defs PASS_MAX_DAYS 7 # chage --list <user> Minimum number of days between password change: 7
remediation:设置/etc/login.defs文件中PASS_MIN_DAYS参数为7 ： PASS_MIN_DAYS 7 修改当前用户的参数相匹配: # chage --mindays 7 <user>
rationale:通过限制密码更改频率，管理员可以防止用户企图规避密码重用控制而反复更改其密码。

oval-def:criteria.comment: the value PASS_MIN_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启用TCP SYN Cookies
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies" should be set to "1".

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断TCP SYN Cookies是否启用： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies = 1
remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf文件中参数net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies为1: net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:攻击者通过发送大量未完成三次握手的SY数据包N，使用SYN洪水发动拒绝服务攻击。这将很快用完内核的半开连接队列插槽，并防止后续的合法连接。SYN cookies允许服务器保持接受的有效连接，即使在拒绝服务攻击的情况下。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies set to 1

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter" Check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter" should be set to "1".

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter set to 1

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Record Attempts to Alter Time Through Adjtimex
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Record attempts to alter time through adjtimex.

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test for either...
both ...

oval-def:criterion.comment: 64bit line for adjtimex and key present

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Auditd Email Account to Notify Upon Action
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: action_mail_acct setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain account

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: passwd文件的用户（组）所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/passwd file should be owned by the appropriate user.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/passwd文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/passwd -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 762 Sep 23 002 /etc/passwd
remediation:如果/etc/passwd文件的用户所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/passwd
rationale:防止对passwd文件产生未经授权的写访问非常重要。虽然在默认情况下处于保护状态，文件权限还是可能会由无意地或是恶意行为所改变。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用ICMP重定向接收
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects" should be set to "0".

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下步骤来确定ICMP重定向报文是否被拒绝： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects = 0 # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects = 0

remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf文件中net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects和net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects参数为0： net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0 net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects=0 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:攻击者可以利用伪造的ICMP重定向报文恶意修改系统的路由表，并让他们将数据包发送到不正确的网络，使系统数据包可以被捕获。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Ensure that Users Have Sensible Umask Values in /etc/profile
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The default umask for all users should be set correctly

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Verify that All World-Writable Directories Have Sticky Bits Set
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The sticky bit should be set for all world-writable directories.

oval-def:criterion.comment: all local world writable directories have sticky bit set

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Configure GUI Screen Locking
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The allowed period of inactivity before the screensaver is activated.

oval-def:criterion.comment: check value of idle_delay in GCONF
check value of idle_delay in GCONF

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects" Check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects" should be set to "0".

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置密码过期时间
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The maximum password age policy should meet minimum requirements.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # grep PASS_MAX_DAYS /etc/login.defs PASS_MAX_DAYS 90 # chage --list <user> Maximum number of days between password change: 90
remediation:设置/etc/login.defs文件中PASS_MAX_DAYS参数为90： PASS_MAX_DAYS 90 修改当前用户的参数相匹配: # chage --maxdays 90 <user>
rationale:攻击者利用被攻陷的凭据或者通过在线暴力破解获得凭据的时间窗口由密码时间限制。 因此减少密码的最大使用期限也可以降低攻击者的成功机率。

oval-def:criteria.comment: the value PASS_MAX_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 记录修改系统强制访问的事件
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Audit rules that detect changes to the system's mandatory access controls (SELinux) are enabled.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断事件是否被记录： # grep MAC-policy /etc/audit/audit.rules -w /etc/selinux/ -p wa -k MAC-policy
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -w /etc/selinux/ -p wa -k MAC-policy 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -P 1-HUP auditd
rationale:此目录中的文件更改表明一个未授权用户正尝试修改访问控制和改变安全环境，从而破坏系统。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The autofs service should be disabled if possible.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The ypbind service should be disabled if possible.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package ypbind should be removed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Preventing direct root login to virtual console devices helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route" Check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route" should be set to "0".

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置密码过期警告天数
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The password expiration warning age should be set appropriately.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # grep PASS_WARN_AGE /etc/login.defs PASS_WARN_AGE 7 # chage --list <user> Number of days of warning before password expires: 7
remediation:设置/etc/login.defs文件中PASS_WARN_AGE参数为7： PASS_WARN_AGE 7 修改当前用户的参数相匹配: # chage --warndays 7 <user>
rationale:提供密码到期的预先告警带给用户时间思考一个安全的密码。用户在措手不及情况下可能会选择简单的密码，或者把密码写下来，增加被发现的可能性。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 移除tftp
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package tftp-server should be removed.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # rpm -q tftp-server package tftp-server is not installed
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # yum erase tftp-server
rationale:如果不需要TFTP服务，建议将守护程序从系统中删除。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Ensure that Users Have Sensible Umask Values set for csh
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The default umask for users of the csh shell

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置网络时间协议(NTP)
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: A remote NTP Server for time synchronization should be specified (and dependencies are met)

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查在参数是否正确： # grep "restrict default" /etc/ntp.conf restrict default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery # grep "restrict -6 default" /etc/ntp.conf restrict -6 default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery 通过运行以下命令判断系统是否被配置为使用NTP服务器，NTP守护进程是否正在非特权用户运行： # grep "^server" /etc/ntp.conf server # grep "ntp:ntp" /etc/sysconfig/ntpd OPTIONS="-u ntp:ntp -p /var/run/ntpd.pid"

remediation:RHEL6默认情况下会自动设置NTP，如果参数不正确，设置以下restrict参数： restrict default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery restrict -6 default kod nomodify notrap nopeer noquery
此外，确保/etc/ntp.conf中有指定的NTP服务器： server <ntp-server>
rationale:建议在无法直接访问物理主机时钟的物理系统和虚拟客户机中配置NTP客户端同步时钟,尤其是安全机制与时间相关的时候（如Kerberos）。这也确保日志文件在整个企业时间一致，有利于审计活动的进行。

oval-def:criteria.comment: ntp.conf conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Implement idle activation of screen lock
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Idle activation of the screen lock should be enabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启用随机虚拟内存区域布局
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "kernel.randomize_va_space" should be set to "2".

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令来判断虚拟内存是否随机化： # sysctl kernel.randomize_va_space kernel.randomize_va_space = 2
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/sysctl.conf文件： # sysctl kernel.randomize_va_space kernel.randomize_va_space = 2
rationale:随机虚拟内存区域将使内存位置不停转移从而增加编写内存页溢出程序的困难程度

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.randomize_va_space set to 2

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 记录可疑数据包
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians" should be set to "1".

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断可疑数据包是否被记录： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians = 1 # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.default.log_martians net.ipv4.conf.default.log_martians = 1

remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf文件中参数net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians和net.ipv4.conf.default.log_martians为1 ： net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=1 net.ipv4.conf.default.log_martians=1 net.ipv4.route.flush=1 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=1 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.log_martians=1 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:启用此功能记录这些数据包允许管理员调查攻击者发送伪造包到其服务器的可能性。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians set to 1

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fremovexattr
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: gshadow文件的访问权限需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: This test makes sure that /etc/gshadow is owned by 0, group owned by 0, and has mode 0000. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL then it will fail the mode check.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/gshadow文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/gshadow ---------- 1 root root 633 Sep 23 2002 /etc/gshadow
remediation:如果/etc/gshadow文件的访问权限不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chmod 000 /etc/gshadow
rationale:如果攻击者可以获得gshadow文件的读访问权限，他们就可以简单地运行密码破解程序进行暴力破解。其他存储在shadow文件的安全信息也可用来破坏用户组帐户，比如密码过期时间。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: gshadow文件的用户组所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/gshadow file should be owned by the appropriate group.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/gshadow文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/gshadow ---------- 1 root root 633 Sep 23 2002 /etc/gshadow
remediation:如果/etc/gshadow文件的用户（组）所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/gshadow
rationale:如果攻击者可以获得gshadow文件的读访问权限，他们就可以简单地运行密码破解程序进行暴力破解。其他存储在shadow文件的安全信息也可用来破坏用户组帐户，比如密码过期时间。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/shadow文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/shadow ---------- 1 root root 633 Sep 23 2002 /etc/shadow

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断crond是否启用： # chkconfig --list crond crond: 0:off 1:off 2:on 3:on 4:on 5:on 6:off
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chkconfig crond on
rationale:虽然用户作业有可能不需要在系统上运行，但系统确实具有包括运行安全监视在内的维护性作业，需要crond来执行它们。

remediation:运行以下命令更正： # service iptables restart # chkconfig iptables on

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启用错误信息保护
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses" should be set to "1".

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令来验证虚假信息是否被忽略： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses = 1

remediation:修改/etc/sysctl.conf文件中参数net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses为1 ： net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses=1 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses=1 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:某些路有器或攻击者将发送违反RFC- 1122的响应并试图使用用许多无用的错误消息填满一个日志文件系统。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集系统管理员操作信息
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Audit actions taken by system administrators on the system.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断管理员行为是否被记录: # grep actions /etc/audit/audit.rules -w /var/log/sudo.log -p wa -k actions
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -w /var/log/sudo.log -p wa -k actions 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd
rationale:/var/log/sudo.log文件变化表明管理员已经执行一个命令或者日志文件已经被篡改。管理员可以将审计事件和/var/log/sudo.log中记录相关联，验证未授权命令是否已被执行。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk Starting to Run Low on Space
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: space_left_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: File grub.conf Owned By root Group
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The grub.conf file should be owned by the root group. By default, this file is located at /boot/grub/grub.conf or, for EFI systems, at /boot/efi/EFI/redhat/grub.conf

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置rsyslog服务将日志发送到远程主机存储
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Syslog logs should be sent to a remote loghost

notes.note:
audit:查看/etc/rsyslog.conf文件，并验证日志是否发送到中心主机：
# grep "^*.*[^I][^I]*@" /etc/rsyslog.conf *.* @@loghost.example.com
remediation:编辑/etc/rsyslog.conf文件，并添加以下行： *.* @@loghost.example.com 执行以下命令重新启动rsyslogd： # pkill -HUP rsyslogd 双“@”符号指定rsyslog使用TCP来给服务器发送日志消息，这是比默认的UDP协议更可靠的传输机制。
rationale:存储日志数据到远程主机上可以保护日志完整性不受本地攻击影响。如果攻击者获得本地系统的root访问权限，他们可以篡改或删除存储在本地系统上的日志数据。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启用源路由验证
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter" should be set to "1".

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断源路由验证是否启用： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter = 1 # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter = 1

remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf文件中net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter和net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter参数为 1： net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter=1 net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter=1 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:设置这些标志是阻止攻击者发送服务器无法响应的伪造数据包的好方法。但如果使用非对称路由则导致这个功能失效，当在系统中使用动态路由协议时即会发生。如果服务器正在使用非对称路由，在不破坏路由德情况下将无法启用此功能。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter set to 1

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Verify that Shared Library Files Have Root Ownership
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Checks that /lib, /lib64, /usr/lib, /usr/lib64, /lib/modules, and objects therein, are owned by root

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fchmodat
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /etc/grub.conf 文件的用户（组）所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The grub.conf file should be owned by the root user. By default, this file is located at /boot/grub/grub.conf or, for EFI systems, at /boot/efi/EFI/redhat/grub.conf

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令来验证/etc/grub.conf的所有者（组）设置： # stat -L -c "%u %g" /etc/grub.conf | egrep "0 0" 如果以上命令没有任何输出则系统没有按推荐方式配置。
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # chown root:root /etc/grub.conf
rationale:设置所有者（组）为root可以防止非root用户篡改启动文件。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Auditd Maximum Log File Size
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: max_log_file setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 确保除root外不存在UID为0的帐户
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Only the root account should be assigned a user id of 0.

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令进行验证，确认只有root被返回： # /bin/cat /etc/passwd | /bin/awk -F: '($3 == 0) { print $1 }' root
remediation:删除命令显示的任何其它条目。
rationale:这种超级权限必须限定给只有root帐户并且只能通过系统控制台访问。

oval-def:criterion.comment: tests for reg exp ^[^r][^o][^o][^t].*:0 in /etc/passwd file

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: gpgcheck选项应当全局启用
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The gpgcheck option should be used to ensure that checking of an RPM package's signature always occurs prior to its installation.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令来验证gpgcheck的所有实例是否设置为1： # grep gpgcheck /etc/yum.conf gpgcheck=1
rationale:RPM包安装前强制进行签名检查可以确保软件来自于一个可信数据源。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /home目录需要单独创建分区
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: If user home directories will be stored locally, create a separate partition for /home. If /home will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

notes.note: audit:验证/etc/fstab文件中是否存在/home分区: #grep /home /etc/fstab <volume> /home ext3 <options>
remediation:对于全新安装的操作系统，勾选“查看和修改分区”并为/home创建一个单独分区。 对于已安装的操作系统，使用LVM（逻辑卷管理器）来创建分区。
rationale:如果系统的目的是满足本地用户，为/home目录创建一个单独分区来防止资源用尽和限制可以存储在/home目录下的文件类型。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Service netconsole Disabled
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The netconsole service should be disabled if possible.

oval-def:criteria.comment: service netconsole is not configured to start

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用tftp服务
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The tftp service should be disabled if possible.

notes.note: rationale:TFTP不支持认证也不能保证数据的完整性和保密性。如果TFTP未被使用，建议关闭xinetd服务。即使使用也需要格外小心配置服务。

oval-def:criteria.comment: package tftp-server removed or service tftp is not configured to start
service tftp is not configured to start

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable usb-storage Kernel Module
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel module usb-storage should be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Confirm Existence and Permissions of System Log Files
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: All syslog log files should be owned by the appropriate user.

oval-def:criterion.comment: check if group root owns all syslog log files

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Mount Remote Filesystems with nodev
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The nodev option should be enabled for all NFS mounts in /etc/fstab.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: passwd文件的用户组所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/passwd file should be owned by the appropriate group.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/passwd文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/passwd -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 762 Sep 23 002 /etc/passwd
remediation:如果/etc/passwd文件的用户组所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/passwd
rationale:防止对passwd文件产生未经授权的写访问非常重要。虽然在默认情况下处于保护状态，文件权限还是可能会由无意地或是恶意行为所改变。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 安装AIDE
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package aide should be installed.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令来验证aide是否已安装： # rpm -q aide aide.<package version>.<hardware platform>
remediation:使用yum安装AIDE： # yum install aide aide.<hardware platform> <package version> installed 初始化AIDE： # /usr/sbin/aide --init -B 'database_out=file:/var/lib/aide/aide.db.gz'
rationale:安装AIDE可以使用其文件完整性功能检测与系统安全相关的重要文件的变更。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set SHA512 Password Hashing Algorithm in /etc/libuser.conf
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/libuser.conf.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Package openswan Installed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package openswan should be installed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Require Client SMB Packet Signing, if using mount.cifs
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Require packet signing of clients who mount Samba shares using the mount.cifs program (e.g., those who specify shares in /etc/fstab). To do so, ensure that signing options (either sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i) are used.

oval-def:criterion.comment: check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/fstab
check for sec=krb5i or sec=ntlmv2i in /etc/mtab

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: gshadow文件的用户（组）所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/gshadow file should be owned by the appropriate user.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/gshadow文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/gshadow ---------- 1 root root 633 Sep 23 2002 /etc/gshadow
remediation:如果/etc/gshadow文件的用户所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/gshadow
rationale:如果攻击者可以获得gshadow文件的读访问权限，他们就可以简单地运行密码破解程序进行暴力破解。其他存储在shadow文件的安全信息也可用来破坏用户组帐户，比如密码过期时间。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_redirects" Check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_redirects" should be set to "0".

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv6.conf.default.accept_redirects set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: group文件的访问权限需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: File permissions for /etc/group should be set correctly.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/group文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/group -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 762 Sep 23 002 /etc/group
remediation:如果/etc/group文件的访问权限不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chmod 644 /etc/group
rationale:group文件需要防止非特权用户进行未经授权的更改。但这些信息应该是可读的，因为很多非特权程序需要使用这些信息。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Password lcredit Requirements
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The password lcredit should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /var/log/audit目录需要单独创建分区
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Audit logs are stored in the /var/log/audit directory. Ensure that it has its own partition or logical volume. Make absolutely certain that it is large enough to store all audit logs that will be created by the auditing daemon.

notes.note: audit:验证/etc/fstab文件中是否存在/var/log分区: #grep /var/log/audit /etc/fstab <volume> /var/log/audit ext3 <options>
remediation:对于全新安装的操作系统，勾选“查看和修改分区”并为/var/log/audit创建一个单独分区。 对于已安装的操作系统，使用LVM（逻辑卷管理器）来创建分区。
rationale:两个原因构成审计日志单独分区的必要性：防止审计日志过大造成资源耗尽和保护审计日志。auditd会计算可用空间并根据结果采取行动。如果其它进程（如syslogd）也在同一分区计算空间，运行情况可能偏出预期。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: TFTP Daemon Uses Secure Mode
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The TFTP daemon should use secure mode.

oval-def:criteria.comment: package tftp-server removed or /etc/xinetd.d/tftp configured correctly

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Auditd Maximum Number of Logs to Retain
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: num_logs setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Record Attempts to Alter Time Through the Localtime File
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Record attempts to alter time through /etc/localtime

oval-def:criteria.comment: Test for localtime file being watched

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置引导加载程序密码
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The grub boot loader should have password protection enabled.

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令来判断启动命令行密码是否被设置： # grep "^password" /etc/grub.conf password --md5 ******** 除MD5外还有其它的密码加密方式。
remediation:使用grub-md5-crypt生成加密密码: # grub-md5-crypt Password: Retype password: ******** 添加密码参数到/etc/grub.conf文件中： password --md5 ********
rationale:需要在执行的的开机密码可以防止进入启动参数或更改启动分区未经授权的用户。这样可以防止用户降低系统安全。

oval-def:criterion.comment: make sure a password is defined in /boot/grub/menu.lst

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Package iputils Removed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package iputils should be removed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Service rdisc Disabled
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The rdisc service should be disabled if possible.

oval-def:criteria.comment: package iputils removed or service rdisc is not configured to start
service rdisc is not configured to start

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set SHA512 Password Hashing Algorithm in /etc/login.defs
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/login.defs.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Auditd Action to Take When Maximum Log Size Reached
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: max_log_file_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Package rhnsd Removed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package rhnsd should be removed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用rhnsd守护程序
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: rhnsd守护进程定期访问Red Hat网站并按计划采取有关动作。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查rhnsd的自动运行级别： # chkconfig --list rhnsd rhnsd: 0:off 1:off 2:off 3:off 4:off 5:off 6:off
remediation:通过运行以下命令禁用rhnsd守护进程： # chkconfig rhnsd off
rationale:补丁管理策略可能需要组织在把相应补丁部署在生产环境之前测试它的影响。自动部署补丁可能对环境带来负面影响，除非妥善考虑否则最好默认不允许任何动作。建议在没有彻底弄清和接受风险前禁用该服务。

oval-def:criteria.comment: package rhnsd removed or service rhnsd is not configured to start
service rhnsd is not configured to start

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Disable sctp Kernel Module
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel module sctp should be disabled.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用数据包重定向发送
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects" should be set to "0".

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令炎症数据包发送重定向是否禁用： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects = 0 # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects = 0

remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf文件中参数net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects和net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects为0 ： net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0 net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects=0
修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1
rationale:攻击者可以利用被攻破的主机发送无效的ICMP重定向到其他路由器设备，企图破坏路由从而让用户访问由攻击者构建的系统。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Password ucredit Requirements
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The password ucredit should meet minimum requirements using pam_cracklib

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Verify /var/log/audit Permissions
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Checks for correct permissions for all log files in /var/log/audit.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 收集用户的文件删除事件
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Audit files deletion events.

notes.note: audit:对于64位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep delete /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k delete -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k delete 对于32位系统，执行以下命令并确保输出如下所示： # grep delete /etc/audit/audit.rules -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k delete

remediation:对于64位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b64 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k delete -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k delete 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd 对于32位系统，添加以下文本行到/etc/audit/audit.rules文件： -a always,exit -F arch=b32 -S unlink -S unlinkat -S rename -S renameat -F auid>=500 -F auid!=4294967295 -k delete 通过运行以下命令重启auditd： # pkill -HUP -P 1 auditd
rationale:监测来自非特权用户的调用可以提供系统管理员不合理地移除文件及文件属性的证据。虽然审核选项着眼于所有事件，系统管理员更关注被修改或删除的特定权限文件。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Kernel Runtime Parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects" Check
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects" should be set to "0".

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_redirects set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 关闭源路由包接收
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The kernel runtime parameter "net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route" should be set to "0".

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令判断源路由包接受是否被禁用： # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route = 0 # /sbin/sysctl net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route = 0

remediation:设置/etc/sysctl.conf文件中参数the net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route和net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route parameters为0: net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route=0 net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route=0 修改活动的内核参数以匹配： # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route=0 # /sbin/sysctl -w net.ipv4.route.flush=1

rationale:设置net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route和net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route为0禁用系统接受源路由包。假设某服务器是能够在某个接口路由数据包到互联网，在另一接口路由数据包到私有地址。假设私有地址是不可路由到互联网地址，反之亦然。在正常的路由设置下，，来自互联网的攻击者不能通过该服务器到达私有地址的服务器。然而如果源路由包被允许，服务器就可以被用来以规定的路线访问私有地址内的系统，而不是依赖于路由协议阻止这种路由行为。

oval-def:criterion.comment: kernel runtime parameter net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route set to 0

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置守护进程的umask标识
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The daemon umask should be set as appropriate

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令来判断守护进程的umask表识是否有效设置： # grep umask /etc/sysconfig/init umask 027
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/sysconfig/init file文件： umask 027
rationale:将umask设置为027将确保由守护进程创建的文件将无法被其所有者和所属用户组以外的程序读取、写入或执行，进程的所属用户组也没有写权限。如果需要额外的权限许可，守护进程可以手动覆盖这些设置。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/group file should be owned by the appropriate user.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/group文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/group -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 762 Sep 23 002 /etc/group
remediation:如果/etc/group文件的用户所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/group
rationale:group文件需要防止非特权用户进行未经授权的更改。但这些信息应该是可读的，因为很多非特权程序需要使用这些信息。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The rlogin service should be disabled if possible.

oval-def:criteria.comment: package rsh-server removed or service rlogin is not configured to start

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: passwd文件的访问权限需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: This test makes sure that /etc/passwd is owned by 0, group owned by 0, and has mode 0644. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL then it will fail the mode check.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/passwd文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/passwd -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 2055 Jan 30 16:30 /etc/passwd
remediation:如果/etc/passwd文件的访问权限不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chmod 644 /etc/passwd
rationale:防止对passwd文件产生未经授权的写访问非常重要。虽然在默认情况下处于保护状态，文件权限还是可能会由无意地或是恶意行为所改变。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: /tmp目录需要单独创建分区
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /tmp directory is a world-writable directory used for temporary file storage. Verify that it has its own partition or logical volume.

notes.note: audit:验证/etc/fstab文件中是否存在/tmp分区: #grep /tmp /etc/fstab <volume> /tmp ext3 <options>
remediation:对于全新安装的操作系统，勾选“查看和修改分区”并为/tmp创建一个单独分区。 对于已安装的操作系统，使用LVM（逻辑卷管理器）来创建分区。
rationale:/tmp目录存在通用可写特性，如果不绑定到独立分区会存在资源耗尽风险。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: No nullok Option in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The file /etc/pam.d/system-auth should not contain the nullok option

oval-def:criterion.comment: make sure the nullok option is not used in /etc/pam.d/system-auth

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Require Authentication for Single-User Mode
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The requirement for a password to boot into single-user mode should be configured correctly.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set ClientAliveCountMax for User Logins
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The SSH ClientAliveCountMax should be set to an appropriate value (and dependencies are met)

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SSH协议的HostbasedAuthentication为No
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: SSH host-based authentication should be disabled.

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断SSH设置： # grep "^HostbasedAuthentication" /etc/ssh/sshd_config HostbasedAuthentication no
remediation:编辑/etc/ssh/sshd_config文件设置如下变量: HostbasedAuthentication no
rationale:尽管/etc/pam.conf文件禁用支持后.rhosts文件是无效的，在SSH中禁止使用.rhosts文件提供了额外层次的保护。

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Red Hat Release and Auxiliary gpg-pubkey Packages Installed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The Red Hat release and auxiliary key packages are required to be installed.

oval-def:criteria.comment: packages gpg-pubkey-fd431d51-4ae0493b and gpg-pubkey-2fa658e0-45700c69 are installed

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SSH协议的用户登录的空闲超时时间
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The SSH idle timeout interval should be set to an appropriate value.

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断SSH设置： # grep "^ClientAliveInterval" /etc/ssh/sshd_config ClientAliveInterval 300 # grep "^ClientAliveCountMax" /etc/ssh/sshd_config ClientAliveCountMax 0
remediation:编辑/etc/ssh/sshd_config文件设置如下变量: ClientAliveInterval 300 ClientAliveCountMax 0
rationale:未设置连接相关的超时值可能导致未授权用户接入另一个用户的SSH会话，设置超时值可以减少这种情况发生的风险。 建议设置ClientAliveInterval为300秒，也可基于站点策略调整。ClientAliveCountMax建议设置为0。在这种情况下，客户端会话将在5分钟空闲时间后终止，没有存活信息会被发送。

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Ensure gpgcheck Enabled For All Yum Package Repositories
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Ensure all yum repositories utilize signature checking.

oval-def:criteria.comment: ensure all yum repositories utilize signiature checking

oval-def:criterion.comment: verify no gpgpcheck=0 present in /etc/yum.repos.d files

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SSH协议的IgnoreRhosts为Yes
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Emulation of the rsh command through the ssh server should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断SSH设置： # grep "^IgnoreRhosts" /etc/ssh/sshd_config IgnoreRhosts yes
remediation:编辑/etc/ssh/sshd_config文件设置如下变量: IgnoreRhosts yes
rationale:设置此参数可强制用户使用ssh认证时输入密码。

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 锁定不活跃的用户帐户
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The accounts should be configured to expire automatically following password expiration.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # useradd -D | grep INACTIVE
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # useradd -D -f 35
rationale:不活动帐户会对系统安全造成威胁，因为用户不会登录查看是否有失败的登陆尝试和其他的异常情况。

oval-def:criteria.comment: the value INACTIVE parameter should be set appropriately in /etc/default/useradd

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Verify that System Executables Have Restrictive Permissions
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Checks that /bin, /usr/bin, /usr/local/bin, /sbin, /usr/sbin, /usr/local/sbin, and objects therein, are not group-writable or world-writable.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 限制内核转储
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Core dumps for all users should be disabled

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令来判断内核转储设置： # grep "hard core" /etc/security/limits.conf * hard core 0 # sysctl fs.suid_dumpable fs.suid_dumpable = 0
remediation:添加以下文本行到/etc/security/limits.conf文件： * hard core 0 添加以下文本行到/etc/sysctl.conf文件 fs.suid_dumpable = 0
rationale:设置核心转储的硬性限制可以防止用户覆盖软性变量。如果核心转储依然需要，考虑设置用户组的限制。此外，设置fs.suid_dumpable变量为0将防止setuid程序访问核心转储。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁止SSH协议中root直接登录
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Root login via SSH should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断SSH设置： # grep "^PermitRootLogin" /etc/ssh/sshd_config PermitRootLogin no
remediation:编辑/etc/ssh/sshd_config文件设置如下变量: PermitRootLogin no
rationale:不允许通过root直接登录SSH需要服务器管理员先使用自己的个人账户认证，然后通过sudo或su提权到root进行。这反过来又限制了不可否认的可能性，并给安全事件的发生提供一个明确的审计方式。

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: shadow文件的用户组所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/shadow file should be owned by the appropriate group.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/shadow文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/shadow ---------- 1 root root 633 Sep 23 2002 /etc/shadow
remediation:如果/etc/shadow文件的用户组所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/shadow
rationale:如果攻击者可以获得shadow文件的读访问权限，他们就可以简单地运行密码破解程序进行暴力破解。其他存储在shadow文件的安全信息也可用来破坏用户帐户，比如密码过期时间。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SSH旗语
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: SSH warning banner should be enabled (and dependencies are met)

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断SSH设置： # grep "^Banner" /etc/ssh/sshd_config Banner <文件名> 文件应当是/etc/issue或/etc/issue.net。
remediation:编辑/etc/ssh/sshd_config文件设置如下变量: Banner /etc/issue.net
rationale:旗语用来警告用户有关特定站点的连接政策。可以咨询法务部门为网站添加适当的文字。

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Verify that System Executables Have Root Ownership
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Checks that /bin, /sbin, /usr/bin, /usr/sbin, /usr/local/bin, /usr/local/sbin and objects therein, are owned by root

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Do Not Allow Users to Set Environment Options
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: PermitUserEnvironment should be disabled

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 禁用交互式启动
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The ability for users to perform interactive startups should be disabled.

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令判断PROMPT选项是否禁用： # grep "^PROMPT=" /etc/sysconfig/init PROMPT=no
rationale:关闭控制台的PROMPT选项，以防止控制台用户覆写已建立的安全设置。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SSH协议PermitEmptyPasswords参数为No
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Remote connections from accounts with empty passwords should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令判断SSH设置： # grep "^PermitEmptyPasswords" /etc/ssh/sshd_config PermitEmptyPasswords no
remediation:编辑/etc/ssh/sshd_config文件设置如下变量: PermitEmptyPasswords no
rationale:禁止远程shell访问采用空口令的帐户可以降低系统未授权访问的可能性。

oval-def:criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: shadow文件的用户所有者需要合理配置
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The /etc/shadow file should be owned by the appropriate user.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查/etc/shadow文件的访问权限: # /bin/ls -l /etc/shadow ---------- 1 root root 633 Sep 23 2002 /etc/shadow
remediation:如果/etc/shadow文件的用户所有者不正确，运行以下命令更正： # /bin/chown root:root /etc/shadow
rationale:如果攻击者可以获得shadow文件的读访问权限，他们就可以简单地运行密码破解程序进行暴力破解。其他存储在shadow文件的安全信息也可用来破坏用户帐户，比如密码过期时间。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 启用SELinux
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Check if selinux=0 OR enforcing=0 within /etc/grub.conf lines, fail if found.

notes.note: audit:通过执行以下命令验证SELinux系统启动时加载： # grep selinux=0 /etc/grub.conf # grep enforcing=0 /etc/grub.conf 如果命令没有输出证明已加载。
rationale:/etc/grub.conf文件中的SELinux必须在系统引导时启动以保证提供有效控制。

oval-def:criterion.comment: check value selinux|enforcing=0 in /etc/grub.conf, fail if found

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SELinux状态
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The SELinux state should be enforcing the local policy.

notes.note: audit:执行以下命令来验证SELinux是否在引动时加载： # grep SELINUX=enforcing /etc/selinux/config SELINUX=enforcing # /usr/sbin/sestatus SELinux status: enabled Current mode: enforcing Mode from config file: enforcing Policy from config file: targeted
rationale:SELinux的必须在系统引导时启动以确保它在任何时候都有控制效果。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 设置SELinux策略
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The SELinux policy should be set appropriately.

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令来验证是否选择了有针对性地政策： # grep SELINUXTYPE=targeted /etc/selinux/config SELINUXTYPE=targeted # /usr/sbin/sestatus SELinux status: enabled Current mode: enforcing Mode from config file: enforcing Policy from config file: targeted
rationale:每个系统的安全设置各不相同。很多管理人员会强制执行比默认策略更严格的策略。本检查项仅仅确保默认策略得到满足。

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Device Files Have Proper SELinux Context
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: All device files in /dev should be assigned an SELinux security context other than 'unlabeled_t'.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Set Last Logon/Access Notification
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Configure the system to notify users of last logon/access using pam_lastlog.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Auditd Action to Take When Disk is Low on Space
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: admin_space_left_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Package GConf2 Installed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package GConf2 should be installed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Package gdm Installed
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: The RPM package gdm should be installed.

oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: 移除mcstrans服务
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: mcstransd守护进程为客户端请求程序提供类别标签信息。标签翻译在/etc/selinux/targeted/setrans.conf文件中定义。

notes.note: audit:通过运行以下命令检查： # rpm -q mcstrans mcstrans.<安装包版本>.<硬件平台>
remediation:运行以下命令更正： # yum erase mcstrans
rationale:该项服务并不是经常被使用，禁用它以减少系统上运行的潜在漏洞代码数量。
